check_dns_records.description:
Checks that all DNS records are properly configured.

This route regularly checks the domain's DNS records to provide "live" information. It opens a stream of Server-Sent Events and sends `dns-record-check-result` events every few seconds.
NOTE: There might be a `(\n|^):(\n|$)` lurking in one of the events. We don't know where it comes from and it should be ignored by SSE parsers but don't be suprised to see it.

text/event-stream.example:
id:IPv4
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"IPv4 record for xmpp.crisp.chat","status":"QUEUED"}

id:IPv6
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"IPv6 record for xmpp.crisp.chat","status":"QUEUED"}

id:SRV-c2s
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"SRV record for client-to-server connections","status":"QUEUED"}

id:SRV-s2s
:
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"SRV record for server-to-server connections","status":"QUEUED"}

id:IPv4
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"IPv4 record for xmpp.crisp.chat","status":"CHECKING"}

id:IPv6
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"IPv6 record for xmpp.crisp.chat","status":"CHECKING"}

id:SRV-c2s
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"SRV record for client-to-server connections","status":"CHECKING"}

id:SRV-s2s
:
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"SRV record for server-to-server connections","status":"CHECKING"}

id:IPv4
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"IPv4 record for xmpp.crisp.chat","status":"VALID"}

id:IPv6
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"IPv6 record for xmpp.crisp.chat","status":"VALID"}

id:SRV-c2s
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"SRV record for client-to-server connections","status":"VALID"}

id:SRV-s2s
event:dns-record-check-result
data:{"description":"SRV record for server-to-server connections","status":"VALID"}

:End of stream
id:end
event:end
data:

dns-record-check-result.summary: A Server-Sent Event containing the result of a DNS record check.
